column4: Hi, in http://www.linuxcommand.org/lts0070.php#file_permissions the author teaches users the chmod command with the use of binary octals.  Is there a trick I can use to remember the octals and the corresponding binary?

Hi, in http://www.linuxcommand.org/lts0070.php#file_permissions the author teaches users the chmod command with the use of binary octals.  Is there a trick I can use to remember the octals and the corresponding binary?  i.e. chmod 700 some_file, chmod 755 some_file?
